name: unsplit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not cut apart or not cut open: He picked up the axe and looked at the unsplit wood. Split the aubergines lengthwise, but leave 2 cm unsplit at each end.
not divided into separate parts: After the demerger, one company will be a quarter of the size of its sister company, but will carry almost half the debt of the unsplit company.
More examplesFewer examplesThe fish are salted and then smoked unsplit over a fire.The stems may be split, but are also used unsplit, in basket making.They wanted to buy some unsplit logs.
